projects.name: Exarp - Project Management Automation MCP Server
projects.description:
MCP server for project management automation tools (Enochian: Spirit of Air - Communication). Provides documentation health, task alignment, duplicate detection, security scanning, and automation opportunities.

## Subprojects
- **DevRadio** (d4b08b19-e05e-409a-a492-b88058de273b) - Automated developer broadcasting station for project updates, music, and alerts. Future fork candidate.

projects.name: DevRadio - Automated Developer Broadcasting Station
projects.description:
üéôÔ∏è FUTURE FORK PROJECT - Automated developer radio/TV station for project updates, music, and alerts. Streams to YouTube Live with AI-generated content, royalty-free music, and real-time project notifications. Designed as standalone subproject for future extraction.

## Fork-Ready Design
- Self-contained module structure
- Independent configuration
- Documented APIs and interfaces
- Separate dependency management

## Core Features
- 24/7 YouTube Live streaming
- AI podcast generation (Podcastfy/Ollama)
- Royalty-free music integration
- Project update narration (TTS)
- Alert system for user interaction
- Legal compliance framework

## Related Memory IDs
- Research: 55d4f7f4-ed03-474f-a4c7-46ad33b23116
- Legal Approach: 62c5d97b-da81-4651-b91e-b82bc37cae71

tasks.name: Fix license format deprecation warning in pyproject.toml
tasks.details:
Fix setuptools deprecation warning about license format in pyproject.toml.

**Fixed:**
Changed from deprecated TOML table format:
  license = {text = "MIT"}

To SPDX string format:
  license = "MIT"

**Benefits:**
- Eliminates deprecation warnings during package build
- Ensures compatibility with setuptools>=77.0.0 requirements
- Build now completes without license format warnings

**Status:** Completed and pushed to repository

tasks.name: Implement run_tests tool for Exarp
tasks.details: Create run_tests MCP tool to execute test suites with flexible options. Support pytest, unittest, and ctest frameworks with auto-detection. Generate JUnit XML reports and return pass/fail counts.

tasks.name: Implement analyze_test_coverage tool for Exarp
tasks.details: Create analyze_test_coverage MCP tool to generate coverage reports and identify gaps. Parse coverage.py, gcov, lcov formats. Generate HTML reports and compare against thresholds.

tasks.name: Implement suggest_test_cases tool for Exarp
tasks.details: Create suggest_test_cases MCP tool to suggest test cases based on code analysis. Analyze function signatures, identify edge cases, suggest parameter combinations, and generate test templates.

tasks.name: Implement validate_test_structure tool for Exarp
tasks.details: Create validate_test_structure MCP tool to validate test organization and patterns. Check naming conventions, validate organization, check for missing test files, and validate test patterns.

tasks.name: Implement sprint_automation tool for Exarp
tasks.details: Create sprint_automation MCP tool to systematically process all background-capable tasks with minimal prompts. Extract subtasks, auto-approve safe tasks, run analysis/testing tools, process background tasks, and identify blockers.

tasks.name: Add human contribution suggestion feature to sprint_automation
tasks.details: Add feature to identify tasks better handled by humans (design decisions, user preferences, strategy, creative work). Generate suggestions for human contributions and integrate into sprint report.

tasks.name: Add AI wishlist generation to sprint_automation
tasks.details: Add feature for sprint_automation to generate its own wishlist of tasks it wants to work on (based on automation opportunities, test coverage gaps, documentation needs, etc.). Store wishlist in structured format.

tasks.name: Add human wishlist parsing to sprint_automation
tasks.details: Add feature to parse human wishlists from external sources: git commit messages, plain text files (WISHLIST.md, TODO.md, etc.), code comments, and issue trackers. Integrate human wishlist with AI wishlist for unified task prioritization.

tasks.name: Phase 0: Project Structure & Fork Preparation
tasks.details:
Set up the DevRadio subproject with a structure designed for future extraction as a standalone repository.

## Deliverables
- Dedicated directory structure under `subprojects/devradio/`
- Independent package.json/requirements.txt
- Standalone configuration system
- README with fork instructions
- Interface documentation for parent project integration

## Fork Extraction Checklist
- [ ] All imports use relative paths within subproject
- [ ] Configuration is environment-variable based
- [ ] No hard dependencies on parent project internals
- [ ] Clear API boundaries documented
- [ ] License file included

tasks.name: Implement AI Session Memory System with MCP Resources
tasks.details:
üéØ **Objective:** Create persistent AI session memory system using agentic-tools memories, exposed as MCP resources for passive context awareness.

## Overview
Enable AI sessions to save/retrieve memories for session continuity, task context, debug history, and user preferences. Expose memories as browsable MCP resources.

## Memory Categories
- **debug** - Error solutions, workarounds, root causes
- **research** - Pre-implementation findings, approach comparisons
- **architecture** - Component relationships, hidden dependencies
- **preference** - User coding style, workflow preferences
- **insight** - Sprint patterns, blockers, optimizations

```
automation://memories                    ‚Üí All memories
automation://memories/category/{cat}     ‚Üí By category
automation://memories/task/{task_id}     ‚Üí Linked to task
automation://memories/recent             ‚Üí Last 24h
automation://memories/session/{date}     ‚Üí Daily summaries
```

## MCP Tools to Create
- `save_session_insight` - Save discovery + auto-link to current task
- `recall_task_context` - Get memories related to a task
- `generate_session_summary` - AI-generated end-of-session learnings

## Integration Points
- Synergy with advisor consultation logs
- Cross-reference with Todo2 tasks
- Enable podcast export of combined wisdom + memories

- Update: `server.py` (register resources)
- Create: `tools/session_memory.py`
- Update: `docs/AI_SESSION_MEMORY.md`

- [ ] Memories persist to `.exarp/memories/`

- [ ] Integration with advisor logs
- [ ] Tests for all components
